name: Tenshi's Winter Surprise
description:
One winter morning, Tenshi was bored as always and was looking for something fun to do. As it turns out, it's been snowing. Looking at the children building snowmen, she gets an idea; she'll give Reimu a nice little "surprise".

Play as Tenshi as she rolls around a massive Snowball, rolling over piles of snow to try to make it bigger and bigger, until it has reached a size big enough to wreck the Hakurei Shrine as a nice late Christmas present for Reimu.

Made for the 10th Touhou Game Jam

CONTROLSMoveArrow Keys / WASD / D-Pad / Left StickConfirmZ / Y / Return / Spacebar / Bottom Face ButtonCancelX  / Shift / Left Face Button

 

CREDITS :

  • Programming/SFX: Trace
  • Art: John/Jiama843 & Bumflr
  • Music: ChiefZika
  • Writing: Black Mage & Nice et Generous

tenshi be ballin'
